messages.subject: Re: [Norton AntiSpam] RE: [unschoolingbasics] Cartoons/games - Pam/Deb/Robin
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kathy, I just wanted to mention that a couple of my sons are into
messages.messageBody:
<<But that is limited to dirt bikes, surfing,
skateboarding, airsoft or PB or BB guns. >>>

Hi Kathy,

I just wanted to mention that a couple of my sons are into surfing and skateboarding. On our last library trip, I borrowed some skateboard and surf magazines and videos. I also found a picture book - I Wished I'd Surfed With the Duke - about surfing, and another with great pics and a bit of history. Oh, and a book on skateboarding tips. I am still looking for a bio of Tony Hawke. :-)

I read these msyelf - they were fun and fascinating - and left them on the coffee table for the boys to peruse, if they wanted to.

There is heaps of info around about your sons' interests , so be enouraged!

Leonie

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
